Text: Christmas CardsGood morning We are at this time again and nonetheless we are keeping the tradition of sending peace during the Holiday season and throughout the year Due to budget and circumstances we the Weather Team will send out cards only knowing that next year will bring positive results Thanks Kevin Moore Shirley and Vince if needed please my home phone is cellular Have a Wonderful Weekend
FW Christmas Moore Kevin G Happy New Year Happy New Year Happy New Year
Vacation Schedule Cc VACATION SCHEDULE Have a Wonderful Thanksgiving Kevin

FW Building Tour Cc Hello Shirley Mark your Calendar as well Thanks KeviN Original Message From Moore Kevin G Sent Tuesday October AM To Russell Iain Cc Kaminski Vince J Roberts Mike A Crenshaw Shirley Subject Building Tour Hello Iain We will take a tour to our new location on Tuesday Nov th Enron Center South Please mark your calendar as you planned to attend with us Time am We will meet in the Ring nearest the Energizer A reminder will be sent Thank You Kevin Moore

Building Tour Cc Hello Iain We will take a tour to our new location on Tuesday Nov th Enron Center South Please mark your calendar as you planned to attend with us Time am We will meet in the Ring nearest the Energizer A reminder will be sent Thank You Kevin Moore

Bosss Day Luncheon Cc Hello Everyone We are doing something a little different this year for our boss What we have to remember is we can not be out of the office for a very long period Lets make this a special time for him Thanks Kevin Moore Massas Resturant am Wednesday If someone has to cover for the team I will cover Enjoy the hour
A Package on FridayPlease let me know if you received a delivery at your home on Friday from the Research Group Thanks Kevin Moore Once again Youre the Greatest Boss

Thursday Staff Meeting Oct thPlease note Research Staff Meeting Today October th Location C Time am Celebrating birthdays today Chris Pernoud Krishna Krishnaroa and Sam Smith Lunch will be served Hope to see everyone and have a wonderful day Kevin Moore

Getting Ready Cc Hello Research Weather Team I will meet with Tiko today to discuss our move on Nov th Please note File space is very limited we must be prepared We will also have our last tour before moving on Novth and we will actually see our new location I am also working with Reggie Wilson to see if maybe we can have a shelf or any other type furniture built to allow us storage space for files papers etc Printers copiers and other equipment is really not a great concern at the moment because we are working to be sure this will be operational All supplies are packed and ready for moving we have a very limited amount in the supplies closet if you need something and you do not see it please do not hesitate to ask Thanks Kevin Moore
Getting Ready Cc Hello Research Weather Team I will meet with Tiko today to discuss our move on Nov th please if there are any concerns let me know I will meet with her at am Thanks Kevin Moore

Assistants CakeHello Mike Vince fyi The Assts on the nd floor really love the cake we have in our monthly staff meetings I can never really bring enough for them all I am going to order a cake for the Assts on the nd floor just for them from the Research Group Weather Team I have enjoyed my experience working with all of them and I look forward to working with them in the future I will pay for the cake I like for others to see the Research Group as one of Enrons finest Thanks Kevin Moore ps the cake will be delivered on Thursday am

New Building Sunday Afternoon Cc Ina Please allow the following people to have access to the new building on Sunday afternoon November th after the move Mike Roberts Jose Marquez Stephen Bennett Adam Stevens Sarah Wooddy Sam Smith Kevin Moore Please note that we will drift in at different times therefore we will not all be here at once
Weather Team TimeSheetspst All Weather Team Time Sheets are completed Thanks Kevin Moore Attn Shirley Joe Hrgovcic is no longer in the system
Weather Team Time Sheetspst All Research Weather Team Time Sheets are completed Thanks Kevin Moore
Just a notepst Have A Great Day Kevin

FW Weather Classpst Research Weather Team Class Today Location Enron Center South Time am Speaker Jose Marquez Please be present Thanks Kevin Moore Asst Please forward reminder Original Message From Moore Kevin G Sent Tuesday January PM To Roberts Mike A Kaminski Vince J Bennett Stephen Shively Hunter S Villarreal Alex Rangel Ina Rybarski Amanda Hillis Kimberly Stevens Adam Marquez Jose Hogan Irena D Black Tamara Jae Vuittonet Laura Wednesday January th Good morning All The Research Weather Team will be presenting another Weather Class The Class will be conducted on Wednesdays at am in room ECS The SpeakerTeacher will be Jose Marquez Please join us Assistants Please forward to your groups Everyone is invited Thanks Kevin Moore

FW Weather Classpst Wednesday January th Good morning All The Research Weather Team will be presenting another Weather Class The Class will be conducted on Wednesdays at am in room ECS The SpeakerTeacher will be Jose Marquez Please join us Assistants Please forward to your groups Everyone is invited Thanks Kevin Moore

FW Market Data Applications Cc Here is a list of consultants that the Weather Research Team has named to be moved under contract to the New Company NET CO The Bloomberg account that we use in ECS was also included Thanks Kevin Moore fyi Original Message From Marcinkowski Danielle Sent Monday January PM To Moore Kevin G Cc Roberts Mike A Subject RE Market Data Applications Do you use Canadian Enterdata or Environment Canada Original Message From Moore Kevin G Sent Monday January PM To Marcinkowski Danielle Cc Roberts Mike A Subject RE Market Data Applications Freez Notis Contact personCharlie Notis Earth Sat Contact personMatt Rodgers Weather Services Intenational Contact personJohn Bossee Accu Weather You can call Dave Ryan for the Contact person on AccuWeather x PDI Planetary Data Incorporated Contact personStoney Cooper Ardmore Contact personSteve Ritter Here is a list of what I have knowlege of so far there may be a few additions Thanks Kevin Moore Original Message From Marcinkowski Danielle Sent Monday January PM To Moore Kevin G Subject RE Market Data Applications Who currently owns the contracts for these systems Please send me a contact name for these services so I can start the contract negotiations Thank you Danielle Original Message From Moore Kevin G Sent Monday January PM To Marcinkowski Danielle Subject RE Market Data Applications What about consultants such as Freez Notis Earth Sat and Weather Services Inc Please inform There maybe a few more Kevin Moore Original Message From Marcinkowski Danielle Sent Monday January PM To Roberts Mike A Cc Moore Kevin G Pechersky Julie Behney Chris Subject Market Data Applications Mike Here are the Market Data applications subscriptions and publications that have been identified to go with Netco Please add any additional systems you will need If you have the vendor contact or contract information please add it to the list These systems have been requested by the Gas and Power group if you know of any other departments that may have additional needs please let me know Thank you Danielle Marcinkowski x File critical appsxls

Weather ClassGood morning All The Research Weather Team will be presenting a new Weather Class Today The Class will be conducted on Wednesdays at am in room ECS The SpeakersTeachers today will be Mike Roberts and Stephen Bennett Please join us Assistants Please forward to your groups Everyone is invited Thanks Kevin Moore
Christmas Thanks so very much Kevin
Christmas Have yourself a Merry Christmas Be Safe and Enjoy Kevin Moore
Research Weather Team Time SheetsAll Weather Team Time Sheets are completed Happy New Year Kevin Moore

FW ECS Weather Gas group recap of meetingOriginal Message From Muschar Daniel Sent Monday October PM To Rangel Ina Smith William Mcnair Jason Fieldhouse Stuart Moore Kevin G Stevens Adam Pernoud Christopher Marquez Jose Subject ECS Weather Gas group recap of meeting Gas Weather Group Special needs Met Boxes Linux must be up st thing in the morning Monday Details MET Must have static IP address Adam will supply MAC address to us in order to get the static IP for ECS assigned before move Connects to monitors on Adams station MET DHCP Connected to monitor on Chris desk with switch box for video only Scheduling MET machines can be moved after Friday afternoon Adam will disconnect the Boxes and we will get churned at PM Adam will configure the boxes at and troubleshoot until working Weekend work people on Saturday and Sunday Details We are scheduling of Jose Marquezs machines to be moved on Monday It has been agreed that the people working this weekend can work from that machine It doesnt matter which machine is taken Testing critical users Details Kevin Moore will create a list of CRITICAL users for the group and forward that to Ina Rangel Ina will compile a list of people who need to come in from PM PM on Sunday for testing To be completed Adam will forward the MAC address of MET to Jason and myself whenever possible Kevin will create list of testers Daniel A Muschar ECS Project Team Lead Office Cell CCNA MCSE CNA A

Just in Casepst Vince take care and may God Bless you and your family Just in case we miss each other on tomorrow it was a great pleasure working with you and I somehow feel that you will make it alright Once again God Bless You and thank you for being a wonderful man Kevin Moore
